trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows status bar control.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controle de barra de status do Windows.

trans-unit.source: Although <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> replaces and adds functionality to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control of previous versions, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: Embora <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> substitua e adicione funcionalidade ao controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> de versões anteriores, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> é mantido para compatibilidade com versões anteriores e uso futuro, se desejado.

trans-unit.source: Typically, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control consists of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects, each of which displays text and/or an icon.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> consiste em controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos, cada um deles exibe texto e/ou um ícone.

trans-unit.source: You can also provide owner-drawn panels to provide custom panels such as a progress bar or a series of images that displays the state of your application.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode fornecer painéis de desenho proprietário para fornecer painéis personalizados, como uma barra de progresso ou uma série de imagens que exibe o estado do seu aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control typically displays information about an object being viewed on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, the object's components, or contextual information that relates to that object's operation within your application.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle exibe informações sobre um objeto que está sendo visualizado em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, componentes do objeto ou as informações contextuais relacionadas à operação do objeto dentro de seu aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control provides properties that enable you to customize the appearance of the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle fornece propriedades que permitem que você personalize a aparência do controle.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> is displayed on a form that can be resized, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.SizingGrip%2A> property to display a sizing grip in the lower-right corner of the form to indicate to users that the form can be resized.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> é exibido em um formulário que pode ser redimensionado, você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.SizingGrip%2A> propriedade para exibir uma alça de dimensionamento no canto inferior direito do formulário para indicar a usuários que o formulário pode ser redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A> property enables you to display panels within your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> or to display only the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A> propriedade permite que você exibir painéis no seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> ou para exibir somente o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> propriedade do controle.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> has no panels.
trans-unit.target: O padrão <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> não tem nenhum painéis.

trans-unit.source: To add panels to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> class that is accessible through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar painéis para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> método do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> classe é acessível por meio do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> propriedade do controle.

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> object provided through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> property to remove panels from the control and access a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> to manipulate the panel.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> fornecido por meio do objeto de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> propriedade para remover painéis de controle e acesso a um determinado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> para manipular o painel.

trans-unit.source: If you want to determine when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> object within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is clicked, you can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> event.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser determinar quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objeto dentro de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle é clicado, você pode criar um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> evento.

trans-unit.source: To perform owner-draw operations on a panel, you can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event.
trans-unit.target: Para executar operações de desenho proprietário em um painel, você pode criar um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> evento.

trans-unit.source: The event data passed to the event handler provides information on the panel to draw and a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to use to perform drawing tasks.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de eventos passados para o manipulador de eventos fornecem informações sobre o painel para desenhar e um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto a ser usado para executar tarefas de desenho.

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>, the read/write properties are set to initial values.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria uma instância de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>, as propriedades de leitura/gravação são definidas com valores iniciais.

trans-unit.source: For a list of these values, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista desses valores, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control on a form and adds two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control em um formulário e adiciona dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects, named `panel1`, displays status text for an application.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos, denominados `panel1`, exibe o texto de status para um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> class to display the current time.
trans-unit.target: A segunda <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, denominado `panel2`, exibe a data atual e usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> classe para exibir a hora atual.

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A> property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> to add the panels to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A> propriedade para garantir que os painéis são exibidos em vez de um painel padrão e utiliza e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> propriedade para acessar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> método do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> para adicionar os painéis para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> properties to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> propriedades para inicializar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos.

trans-unit.source: This example requires that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo requer que o método definido no exemplo é definido e chamado a partir do construtor de uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> has no panels.
trans-unit.target: O padrão <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> não tem nenhum painéis.

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>, the following read/write properties are set to initial values.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria uma instância de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>, as seguintes propriedades de leitura/gravação são definidas com valores iniciais.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Propriedade

trans-unit.source: Initial value
trans-unit.target: Valor inicial

trans-unit.source: You can change the value for any of these properties through a separate call to the property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode alterar o valor de qualquer uma dessas propriedades por meio de uma chamada separada para a propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to construct a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> and use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.SizingGrip%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> members and how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como construir um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> e usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.SizingGrip%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> membros e como tratar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> evento.

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o exemplo, cole o código a seguir em um formulário.

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o `InitializeStatusBarPanels` método no construtor do formulário ou `Load` método.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor da tela de fundo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that is the background color of the control
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> que é a cor da tela de fundo do controle

trans-unit.source: This is an ambient property and will always return a non-null value.
trans-unit.target: Isso é uma propriedade de ambiente e sempre retornará um valor não nulo.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.BackColor" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.BackColor" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a imagem da tela de fundo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> that is the background image for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> que é a imagem de plano de fundo para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />.

trans-unit.source: Setting the background image for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> has no effect on the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control, therefore it is not shown in the designer or by IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: Definir a imagem de plano de fundo para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> não tem nenhum efeito na aparência do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle, portanto ele não é exibido no designer ou pelo IntelliSense.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.BackgroundImage" /> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.BackgroundImage" /> foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the layout of the background image of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o layout da imagem de tela de fundo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" />.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> has no effect on the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control, therefore it is not shown in the designer or by IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: Definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> não tem nenhum efeito na aparência do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle, portanto ele não é exibido no designer ou pelo IntelliSense.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.BackgroundImageLayout" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.BackgroundImageLayout" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: Overrides <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle" />.
trans-unit.target: Substitui <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateHandle" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" /> used to create the handle for this control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" /> usado para criar o identificador para este controle.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" /> used to create the handle for this control.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" /> usado para criar o identificador para este controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default Input Method Editor (IME) mode supported by this control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o modo IME (Editor de Método de Entrada) padrão compatível com esse controle.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode" />.

trans-unit.source: As implemented in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> class, this property always returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode.Disable?displayProperty=nameWithType> value.
trans-unit.target: Conforme implementado o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> classe, essa propriedade sempre retorna o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode.Disable?displayProperty=nameWithType> valor.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho padrão do controle.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que representa o tamanho do controle.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />.
trans-unit.target: Descarta os recursos (exceto a memória) usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo método público `Dispose` e pelo método <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` invoca o método `Dispose(Boolean)` protegido com o parâmetro `disposing` definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, esse método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> referências.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o método `Dispose` de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> pode ser chamado várias vezes por outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, tome cuidado para não referenciar objetos que tenham sido descartados anteriormente em uma chamada anterior para <see langword="Dispose" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como implementar <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, consulte [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre <see langword="Dispose" /> e <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [substituindo o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the docking behavior of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o comportamento de encaixe do controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Bottom" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="Bottom" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this control should redraw its surface using a secondary buffer to reduce or prevent flicker, however this property has no effect on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se este controle deve redesenhar sua superfície usando um buffer secundário para reduzir ou evitar a cintilação. No entanto, essa propriedade não tem nenhum efeito no controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control has a secondary buffer; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o controle tem um buffer secundário; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property has no effect on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control, therefore it is not shown in the designer or by IntelliSense.
trans-unit.target: A definição dessa propriedade não tem nenhum efeito o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle, portanto ele não é exibido no designer ou pelo IntelliSense.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a visual aspect of an owner-drawn status bar control changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um aspecto visual de um controle de barra de status desenhado pelo proprietário é alterado.

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform drawing operations in an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse evento para executar operações de desenho de um desenho proprietário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you display an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that displays a progress bar, you can use this event to perform the drawing of the progress bar on the panel.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você exibir um desenho proprietário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> que exibe uma barra de progresso, você pode usar esse evento para executar o desenho da barra de progresso no painel.

trans-unit.source: The data provided to the event through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> object passed as a parameter to the event handler enables you to determine the panel that needs to be drawn and the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to use to draw to the panel.
trans-unit.target: Os dados fornecidos para o evento por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> objeto passado como um parâmetro para o manipulador de eventos permite que você determine o painel que precisa ser desenhado e <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> para usar para desenhar o painel.

trans-unit.source: This event is only raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle.OwnerDraw>.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento só é gerado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> em uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle é definido como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle.OwnerDraw>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that displays a custom background and the current date.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar um desenho proprietário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> que exibe um plano de fundo personalizado e a data atual.

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have connected the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control to the event handler defined in the example.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo requer que você está conectado a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> eventos de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle ao manipulador de eventos definido no exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control will use to display information.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a fonte que o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> usará para exibir informações.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> of the text.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> do texto.

trans-unit.source: The default is the font of the container, unless you override it.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é a fonte do contêiner, a menos que você o substitua.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the forecolor for the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de primeiro plano para o controle.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the forecolor of the control.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> que representa a cor de primeiro plano do controle.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="Empty" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ForeColor" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ForeColor" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Input Method Editor (IME) mode supported by this control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modo IME (Editor de Método de Entrada) compatível com este controle.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ImeMode" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ImeMode" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnDrawItem(System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs)" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnDrawItem(System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs)" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnDrawItem%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnDrawItem%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that displays a custom background and the current date.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar um desenho proprietário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> que exibe um plano de fundo personalizado e a data atual.

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have connected the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control to the event handler defined in the example.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo requer que você está conectado a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> eventos de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle ao manipulador de eventos definido no exemplo.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnDrawItem(System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnDrawItem(System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnDrawItem(System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnDrawItem(System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: When overriding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnHandleCreated%2A> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnHandleCreated%2A> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleDestroyed" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleDestroyed" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnHandleDestroyed(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleDestroyed(System.EventArgs)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnHandleDestroyed(System.EventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleDestroyed(System.EventArgs)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="LayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="LayoutEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see langword="Layout" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see langword="Layout" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnLayout(System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnPanelClick(System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs)" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnPanelClick(System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs)" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnPanelClick%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnPanelClick%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnPanelClick(System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnPanelClick(System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnPanelClick(System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnPanelClick(System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnResize(System.EventArgs)" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnResize(System.EventArgs)" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For an overview, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma visão geral, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnResize(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnResize(System.EventArgs)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.OnResize(System.EventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnResize(System.EventArgs)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> é redesenhado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> object on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> em um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> é clicado.

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform tasks when a panel within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse evento para executar tarefas quando um painel em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle é clicado.

trans-unit.source: The data provided to the event through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs> passed as a parameter to the event handler enables you to determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that was clicked by the user in order to perform tasks on the selected panel.
trans-unit.target: Os dados fornecidos para o evento por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelClickEventArgs> passado como um parâmetro para o manipulador de eventos permite que você determine a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> que foi clicado pelo usuário para executar tarefas no painel selecionado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.SizingGrip%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> members and how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.SizingGrip%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> membros e como tratar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> evento.

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o exemplo, cole o código a seguir em um formulário.

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o `InitializeStatusBarPanels` método no construtor do formulário ou `Load` método.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> panels contained within the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de painéis <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> contidos no controle.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection" /> containing the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> objects of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection" /> que contém os objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control can display a number of panels to provide information to the user of your application.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle pode exibir um número de painéis para fornecer informações ao usuário do seu aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: For example, a panel could display the current time or the progress of a file download.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um painel pode exibir a hora atual ou o andamento do download de um arquivo.

trans-unit.source: Each panel displayed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> class.
trans-unit.target: Cada painel exibido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle é uma ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> property enables you to obtain a reference to the collection of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects that are currently stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> propriedade permite que você obtenha uma referência para a coleção de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos que estão atualmente armazenados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle.

trans-unit.source: With this reference, you can add panels, remove panels, access a specific panel within the collection, and obtain a count of the panels in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Com essa referência, você pode adicionar painéis, remova os painéis, acessar um painel específico dentro da coleção e obter uma contagem dos painéis no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the tasks that can be performed with the panel collection, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> class reference topics.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as tarefas que podem ser executadas com a coleção de painel, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> tópicos de referência de classe.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control on a form and adds two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control em um formulário e adiciona dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects, named `panel1`, displays status text for an application.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos, denominados `panel1`, exibe o texto de status para um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> object, named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> class to display the current time.
trans-unit.target: A segunda <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objeto, chamado `panel2`, exibe a data atual e usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> classe para exibir a hora atual.

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A> property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> to add the panels to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A> propriedade para garantir que os painéis são exibidos em vez de um painel padrão e utiliza e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> propriedade para acessar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> método do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> para adicionar os painéis para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> properties to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> propriedades para inicializar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos.

trans-unit.source: This example requires that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo requer que o método definido no exemplo é definido e chamado a partir do construtor de uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether any panels that have been added to the control are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os painéis que foram adicionados ao controle são exibidos.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if panels are displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se os painéis forem exibidos; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control displays the value of its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property without any panels.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle exibe o valor da sua <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> propriedade sem qualquer painéis.

trans-unit.source: When `ShowPanels` is set to `true`, any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Quando `ShowPanels` é definido como `true`, qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos especificados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle são exibidos.

trans-unit.source: No panels are initially created when you create an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> class.
trans-unit.target: Não há painéis são criadas inicialmente quando você cria uma instância do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> classe.

trans-unit.source: You can add panels to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar painéis para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> método o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> classe.

trans-unit.source: This collection class can be accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe de coleção pode ser acessado por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control on a form and adds two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control em um formulário e adiciona dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects, named `panel1`, displays status text for an application.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos, denominados `panel1`, exibe o texto de status para um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> class to display the current time.
trans-unit.target: A segunda <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, denominado `panel2`, exibe a data atual e usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> classe para exibir a hora atual.

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A> property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> to add the panels to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A> propriedade para garantir que os painéis são exibidos em vez de um painel padrão e utiliza e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> propriedade para acessar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> método do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> para adicionar os painéis para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> properties to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> propriedades para inicializar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos.

trans-unit.source: This example requires that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo requer que o método definido no exemplo é definido e chamado a partir do construtor de uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a sizing grip is displayed in the lower-right corner of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se uma alça de dimensionamento é exibida no canto inferior direito do controle.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a sizing grip is displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se for exibida uma alça de dimensionamento; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display a sizing grip to provide an indication to the user when a form is resizable.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para exibir uma alça de dimensionamento para fornecer uma indicação para o usuário quando um formulário é redimensionável.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A> property of your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> is set to a border style that is not resizable, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.Fixed3D> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.FixedDialog>, you should set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.SizingGrip%2A> property to `false` to prevent the user from thinking that the form can be resized.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A> propriedade do seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> é definido como um estilo de borda não pode ser redimensionado, como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.Fixed3D> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormBorderStyle.FixedDialog>, você deve definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.SizingGrip%2A> propriedade `false` para impedir que o usuário assume que o formulário pode ser redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.SizingGrip%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> members and how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.SizingGrip%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> membros e como tratar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> evento.

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o exemplo, cole o código a seguir em um formulário.

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o `InitializeStatusBarPanels` método no construtor do formulário ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user will be able to tab to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o usuário poderá usar a tecla Tab para ir para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the tab key moves focus to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a tecla tab move o foco para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto associado ao controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />.

trans-unit.source: The text associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: O texto associado ao controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />.

trans-unit.source: This property represents the text displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade representa o texto exibido pelo controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control displays only the first 127 characters of a string.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle exibe somente os primeiros 127 caracteres de uma cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Text%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o exemplo, cole o código a seguir em um formulário.

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeSimpleStatusBar` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o `InitializeSimpleStatusBar` método no construtor do formulário ou `Load` método.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation for this control.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma representação de cadeia de caracteres para este controle.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: Cadeia de Caracteres

trans-unit.source: The Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> to process.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> do Windows a ser processado.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Processa mensagens do Windows.
